titleStmt.title: SII 7.430: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 430. (A.R. No. 217 of 1901). ON THE NORTH, WEST AND SOUTH WALLS OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiruvāykkeḻvi muṉṉākat tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīrācarācatevaṟku yāṇṭu 5vatu siṁhanāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu pañcamiyum putaṉkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Aśvati nāḷ jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuk kāliyūrkkoṭṭattup pākūrnāṭṭu Ukkalāṉa vikkiramāparaṇaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyom Immaṇṭalaṁttu Īkkāṭṭukkoṭṭattuk kākkalūrnāṭṭuc celaiyil vāṇikaṉ paṭampakkanāyakaṉ Aḻakiyaperumāḷukku nāṅkaḷ Eṅkaḷ piṭākaiyil viṟṟukkuṭutta śrīkṛṣṇaccerik kuḷaṅkaḷ Eḻuttiṭṭukkuṭutta pramāṇappaṭiye kalveṭṭuvittuk kuṭuttaparicāvatu Ittevarkku yāṇṭu nālāvatu mituṉanāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattup pañcamiyun tiṅkaṭkkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa cataiyattu nāḷ jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuk kāliyūrkkoṭṭattup pākūrnāṭṭu Ukkalāṉa vikkiramāparaṇaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyom
pūmivilaipramāṇak kaiyeḻuttu Immaṇṭalattu Īkkāṭṭukkoṭṭattuk kākkalūrnāṭṭuc celaiyil vāṇikaṉ paṭampakkanāyakaṉ Aḻakiyaperumāḷukku nāṅkaḷ viṟakiṉṟa Ūrāvatu Eṅkaḷurk kiḻpiṭākai śrīkṛṣṇaccerikkuk kiḻpāṟkellai vayalaiyāṟṟūr Ellaikku meṟkun teṉpāṟkellai ceyyāṟṟi lāṟupāti Uṭpaṭa vaṭakku melpāṟkellai mākaṟa lerikkup pāynta Āṟṟukkālukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai yivvāṟṟukkālukkut teṟkum Innāṟpāṟkellaikkuḷ naṭuvupaṭṭa nirnilamum kollainilamum nattamaṉaiyum maṉaippaṭappaiyum meṉokkiṉa maramuṅ kiṇokkiṉa kiṇaṟum nirum nirpāyccalum vaḻiyum vaḻippokkum yāṅka ḷuṭaiyapaṭiye yurittāvatākavum nāṅka ḷivaṉukku viṟṟukkuṭuttuk koḷvatāṉa Emmilicainta vilaipporuḷ Aṉṟāṭu naṟpaḻaṅkācu 8 10 Ippaḻaṅkācu Eṇpatum Āvaṇakkaḷiye kāṭṭeṟṟik kiḻikaiccelavaṟak kaikkoṇṭu viṟṟu vilaippiramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭuttom celaiyil vāṇikaṉ paṭampakkanāyakaṉ
Aḻakiyaperumāḷukku Ukkalāṉa vikkiramāparaṇaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyom Ippaṭi yivaṉukku viṟṟukkuṭutta Ivvūrkku Epperppaṭṭa kalaṉu millai kalaṉuḷavāyt toṟṟil nāṅkaḷe tirttukkuṭukkak kaṭavomākavum Itukku Ituve vilaiyāvatākavum Ivvū rivaṉukku viṟṟoṟṟipratikreyatāṉaṅkaḷuk kurittāvatākavum Ivvūrkku Ūrkkaṇakkakkāṇiyuṭaiyavaṉum Ācuvikaḷum paṇṭoṭu paḻanaṭai kāṇiyuṭaiyavaṉe ceyyakkaṭavatākavum Ippaṭi cammatittu pramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭuttom celaiyil vāṇikaṉ paṭampakkanāyakaṉ Aḻakiya perumāḷukku Ukkalāṉa vikkiramāparaṇaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyom Ippaṭikku mahāsabhaiyār paṇikka veḻutiṉeṉ Ivvūr maddhyastaṉ poṟkkuṟi Ukkaluṭaiyāṉ tiruvattiyūrāḻvāṉ cūriyateva ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākaik kecavapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākaic ciṅkappirāṉapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākai veṇṇaikkūttapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu
Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākai Aruḷāḷapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kārampicceṭṭu Aruḷāḷapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākai Iḷaiyacirāmapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākai AIḷaiyatiruvākkulapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākai vātirācapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai moṭṭaippuṟattu Attāmapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākaic cirāmapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai koṭṭurp piṉpoṉavillipaṭṭaṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai koṭṭur vāmaṉapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai keṅkātirapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai muṭumpai Attāmapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai muṭumpaik kecavapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai muṭumpai maturaippirāṉpaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai muṭumpai Irāmapirāṉpaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai koṭṭur Āṭkoṇṭavillipaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai maṅkalūrt tiruveṅkaṭapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai maṅkalūr śrīkṛṣṇapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai maṅkalūr Ejñamurttipaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai muṭumpai
nārāyaṇapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai Otimukkil nārāyaṇapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākai nantakopālapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākai Ejñāṟppaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākait tiruvākkulapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai Aṭṭāmpuṟattut tevarācapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai Aiyakkicciyanumatāta ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai Araṇaippuṟattu śrīkṛṣṇapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai Araṇaippuṟattu veṇṇaikkūttapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟu Iḷaiyapaḷḷikoṇṭāṉpaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟu viranārāyaṇapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai koṭṭi Āṭkoṇṭavillipaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟu śrīkṛṣṇapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟu kecavapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟup peraruḷāḷapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟu veṇṇaikkūttapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟu Iḷaiyaśrīkṛṣṇapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟuk kolavarākapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu
Ippaṭikku Ivai pāṭakattu Ulokasākṣipaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟuc cūriyatevapaṭṭaṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟu Āḷavaṉtāṉpaṭṭaṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākaik kovintapaṭṭaṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai moṭṭaippuṟattu Iḷaiyavarataṉpaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai moṭṭaippuṟattu śrīkṛṣṇapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai moṭṭaippuṟattu Iḷaiyaattāmapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṭeṟṟup paḷḷikoṇṭāṉ- paṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākai Irāmapirāṉpaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākait tiruveṅkaṭapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākai niṉṟanārāyaṇapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai Aiyakkik kecavapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai prayākai nārāyaṇapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai ceruppaḷḷi mātevapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai moṭṭaippuṟattut tiruveṅkaṭapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai moṭṭaippuṟattu vāmaṉapaṭṭaṉukku Ikkuṭit tiruveṅkaṭapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai pāṭakattu nantakopālapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai
piṟāntūr Aruḷāḷapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai vaṅkippuṟattu Aiyappiḷḷai yeḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai ceruppaḷḷi paṟpanāpapaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu—ippaṭikku Ivai Ukkaluṭaiyāṉa Aṟāmapirā ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Ukkal civappirāmaṇaṉ kuṉikkum ppirāṉpaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ civappirāmaṇaṉ Āṇṭāṉpaṭṭaṉeṉ Ukkal tiruvaṭippiṭikkum pirāṉpuṟattu śrīkṛṣṇapaṭṭaṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ nāpitan kaittāṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ taṭṭān ciruṭaikkaḻa lācāriyaṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Ivvūrt taccanārāyaṇaṉ tiruvakattiyāṉa Āyirattirunūṟṟuva Ācāriyaṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ karumāṉ sahātevaṉ Attaāṇic celvaṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ mākaṟal neṟkuṉṟaṅkiḻāṉ puliyaṉ tiruviruntaperumāḷeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ mākaṟalil Ūraṅkiḻāṉ tirupper tiruvakatticuramuṭaiyāṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Ūraṅkiḻāṉ vāṉavaṉ viḻupparayaṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Ūraṅkiḻāṉ vaḷavamuventaveḷāṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Eṉātikiḻavaṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ paṭṭiyarpocaṉ periya Aruḷāḷaṉeṉ
Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ civappirāmaṇaṉ kulacekaṟa nāṟpatteṇṇāyirapaṭṭaṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ koyilāṉ tevapperumāḷeṉ Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ Ivvūr Ūrkkaṇakku mākaṟaluṭaiyāṉ Aracaṉeṉ Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ vayalaiyāṟṟūrc ciṅkaḷattarayaṉeṉ Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ nilamaṅkalamuṭaiyāṉ Aṇṭi ppaṭi yaṟiveṉ maṅkalamuṭaiyāṉ centāmaraikkaṇṇaṉ Uyyavantāṉeṉ Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ Ivvūrp paḷḷiuṭaiyāṉ Iluppaimarakkiḻāṉ Upaiyātittaṉeṉ Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ Ivvūr veṇṇainalluḻāṉ tiruvaiyāṟuṭaiyāṉ maturavācakaṉeṉ Ippaṭikkuc cilālekai paṇṇikkuṭuttamaikku sapaiyār paṇiyāl Ivvūr maddhyastaṉ Ukkaluṭaiyāṉ tiruvattiyūrāḻvāṉ tā ṉeḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.430 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
